timeline.message:
HiveUserData: Remove filterInFragmenter

The `filterInFragmenter` field is not being consumed by anyone. Removing
it.
HiveUserData: Remove allColumnTypes from HiveUserData

Parse HiveUserData once

Parse the HiveUserData object once during the accessor call. The parsed
HiveUserData is then shipped to the resolver using the
RequestContext#metadata field.

HiveUserData: Remove serdeClassName from HiveUserData

The serde class name is available in the properties used for serde.

HiveUserData: Remove inputFormatName from HiveUserData

The input format class name can be retrieved from the serde properties
by accessing the "file.inputformat" property.

HiveUserData: Remove allColumnNames from HiveUserData

The same information is retrieved from the "columns" property of the
metadata properties that were retrieved during fragmentation.

HiveUserData: Remove colTypes from HiveUserData

The column types can be retrieved from the metadata properties that are
shipped by the Fragmenter.

HiveUserData: Remove skipHeader from HiveUserData

The skip header property is part of the metadata properties that we ship
from the fragmenter call.

HiveUserData: Remove delimiter property from HiveUserData

Merge map where the property is coming from with the properties. Parse
delimiter at the Resolver only if needed.
wip

Remove HiveUserData

Only pass the schema properties from the fragmenter to the
accessor/resolver.
Fix automation tests
Hardcode HOSTS as it is no longer being used
Remove properties not used
Use Kryo to serialize properties
Use a custom Properties serializer
Add javadocs and tests
